Detailed Description

Represent a RL experiment.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Experiment::Experiment ( std::istream &  is)

Constructor.

Parameters
isThe 'ifstream' containting the data representing the Experiment to load. (can either be compressed or uncompressed)
Experiment::Experiment ( std::string  name,
std::vector< MDP * > &  mdpList,
unsigned int  nbSimPerMDP,
double  simGamma_,
unsigned int  T_,
bool  safeSim_ = false,
bool  saveTraj = false 
)

Constructor. The responsibility to delete the MDPs is transfered to this Experiment.

Parameters
nameThe name of this Experiment.
mdpListThe test MDPs.
nbSimPerMDPThe number of simulations per MDP.
simGamma_The discount factor to use for the simulations.
T_The horizon limit.
safeSim_If true, the MDP is 'unknown', preventing the agent to access MDP data (e.g.: the transition matrix).
saveTraj_True if the complete trajectories must be saved.
